sections.title: Verse 1: Relationship
sections.content:
Verse Progression: D - C - Bb - A - D - C - Bb - A
Strumming Pattern: ↓(rake) ↓ ↑ ↓(rake) ↑ ↓ ↑

Each chord = 2 measures (8 beats)

D Major (↓(rake) ↓ ↑ ↓(rake) ↑ ↓ ↑)

Lyrics: 
"You always said we’d work it out, 
But we’re stuck in these same old fights,
Another year goes by, 
And nothing ever feels right."

sections.title: Chorus: Persistent Misconduct (Build or Destroy)
sections.content:
Chorus Progression: D - C - Bb - A
Strumming Pattern: ↓ ↓ ↑ (rake) ↑ ↓ ↑

Lyrics: 
"Persistent misconduct, 
We build or we destroy, 
Through every word we say, 
Are we lost or are we found?"

sections.title: Verse 2: Culture
sections.content:
Verse Progression: D - C - Bb - A - D - C - Bb - A
Strumming Pattern: ↓(rake) ↓ ↑ ↓(rake) ↑ ↓ ↑

Each chord = 2 measures (8 beats)

D Major (↓(rake) ↓ ↑ ↓(rake) ↑ ↓ ↑)

Lyrics: 
"We try to hold on to what's left, 
But the chains still feel so tight,
Old ways, they hold us down, 
And the fight’s still in our sight."

sections.title: Verse 3: Politics
sections.content:
Verse Progression: D - C - Bb - A - D - C - Bb - A
Strumming Pattern: ↓(rake) ↓ ↑ ↓(rake) ↑ ↓ ↑

Each chord = 2 measures (8 beats)

D Major (↓(rake) ↓ ↑ ↓(rake) ↑ ↓ ↑)

Lyrics: 
"The promises they make, 
Never seem to hold their weight,
We fight for what is ours, 
But the truth is out of state."

sections.title: Bridge Section
sections.content:
Bridge Progression: Bb - A - D
Strumming Pattern: ↑ ↑ ↓ (rake) ↑ ↓ ↑

Lyrics: 
"We keep on breaking and bending, 
Chasing shadows in the night,
But can we find a way to heal, 
And make the wrongs come right?"
